body_html:
I just submitted Pull Request #728 to add very basic CMake support to TensorFlow. It builds the tutorial C++ training example (along with all dependencies).

Limitations: no GPU, no python, no tests, no install targets, tested only on MacOSX, and needs a bit of code cleanup. It's a first version to get the ball rolling. I'll continue to work on it, your comments are more than welcome.
body_text:
I just submitted Pull Request #728 to add very basic CMake support to TensorFlow.  It builds the tutorial C++ training example (along with all dependencies).
Limitations: no GPU, no python, no tests, no install targets, tested only on MacOSX, and needs a bit of code cleanup. It's a first version to get the ball rolling.  I'll continue to work on it, your comments are more than welcome.
body:
I just submitted Pull Request https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/728 to add very basic CMake support to TensorFlow.  It builds the tutorial C++ training example (along with all dependencies).

Limitations: no GPU, no python, no tests, no install targets, tested only on MacOSX, and needs a bit of code cleanup. It's a first version to get the ball rolling.  I'll continue to work on it, your comments are more than welcome.
